body_html:
My mistake, I figured this out. This was related to the removal of the reuse parameter in a previous commit. When running convergence tests, I was recreating the variables in a train and eval graph and add_varaible vs. get_variable seem to be treating the reuse scope differently when not passed directly into the cell.

I will push a working solution after further testing. Should be good to go then!

body:
My mistake, I figured this out. This was related to the removal of the reuse parameter in a previous commit. When running convergence tests, I was recreating the variables in a train and eval graph and add_varaible vs. get_variable seem to be treating the reuse scope differently when not passed directly into the cell.

I will push a working solution after further testing. Should be good to go then!
